post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
For those interested, monitor this media converage to be the first one to know what they say about it.

SlashDot (http://slashdot.org)
The Server Site (http://www.theserversite.com)
InfoWorld (http://www.infoworld.com)
eWeek (http://www.eweek.com)
DevX Forums (http://forums.devx.com/forumdisplay.php?f=154)
Java Developer's Journal (http://java.sys-con.com/)
Java Pro (http://www.javapro.com)
JSpin (http://www.jspin.com)
OnJava.com - Pieter Humphrey
TechRepublic.com
Dr. Dobb's Journal (http://www.ddj.com)
CNet (http://www.cnet.com)
Planet Eclipse (http://www.planeteclipse.org)
EclipseZone (http://www.eclipsezone.com)
Eclipse Plugin Central (http://www.eclipseplugincentral.com)
JSurfer (http://www.jsurfer.org)
TechForge (http://eclipse.techforge.com)
Code Zoo (http://www.codezoo.com)
post.title: Eclipse WTP 1.0 is almost at the door
